data.name: Sprite Fight
data.detailed_description:
Sprite Fight is an action-packed 2D platform fighter with the use of long-ranged combat and the ability to battle your friends. With a series of unique game modes to brawl out together, acquire a variety of weapons through plenty of stages to fend off your opponents and come out victorious.

MULTIPLE GAME MODES

What separates Sprite Fight from the typical 2D platform fighter is the variety of unique game modes, some being king of the hill, beach ball keep-up, shotgun frenzy, gun game, disk shoot-down, and more to come.

TONS OF STAGES

With a multitude of stages, you'll be able to traverse different areas of the Sprite Fight world to battle amongst your peers.

LOTS OF WEAPONS

With over 20+ weapons at your disposal, you'll be able to quickly cycle through your gallery of weapons and attack foes with what you're given.

WACKY PHYSICS

With stages based around your skill to navigate platforms with moving chains and stages where you avoid flying platforms coming at you, the physics system in Sprite Fight is a lot to unpack.

CHARACTER SELECTION

You'll be able to navigate through different cosmetic looks for you to battle your friends with.

data.short_description: Sprite Fight is an action-packed 2D platform fighter with the use of long-ranged combat and the ability to battle your friends. With a series of unique game modes to brawl out together, acquire a variety of weapons through plenty of stages to fend off your opponents and come out victorious.
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (32-bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT / AMD HD 6850 / Intel HD Graphics 4400 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
